ing: 1 (4 ounce) jar pimento peppers, drained and chopped
1/2 pound Colby cheese, cut into 1/4-inch cubes
n: Pea Salad With Pimentos and Cheese
des: "This is a quick and easy - and tasty - recipe that was a standard at my extended family's special dinners. Great Aunt Betty almost always brought this as a dish to pass, and it was always gone by the end of dinner."
ins: Mix peas, pimento peppers, Colby cheese, onion, mayonnaise, salt, and black pepper together in a bowl with a lid. Cover and refrigerate for at least 12 hours before serving for best flavor; stir again before serving.
